name: Interface IfTree
text:
A tree node for an 'if' statement.

 For example:
 
   if ( condition )
      thenStatement

   if ( condition )
       thenStatement
   else
       elseStatement
codes:
@Deprecated(since="11",
            forRemoval=true)
public interface IfTree
extends StatementTree

methods.description: Returns the condition expression of this 'if' statement.
Returns the 'then' statement of this 'if' statement.

Returns the then statement of this 'if' statement.
 null if this if statement has no else branch.
